long_description: Built for aggressive 29er riding, the Easton EA70 XCT 29 in. Front Wheel offers tubeless compatability and high-end welded aluminum rims and butted spokes for strength. UST tubeless compatibility offers the benefits of tubeless (lighter weight, lower tire pressure and fewer flats), with the option of using a traditional tube/tire setup. 19mm internal rim width fits tires to 2.35 in. wide, and a wide tire profile means more surface area for traction on tough trails. The Easton EA70 XCT 29 in. Front Wheel rolls on sealed cartridge bearings for long-lasting, smooth performance.
short_description: Built for aggressive 29er riding, the Easton EA70 XCT 29 in. Front Wheel offers tubeless compatability and high-end welded aluminum rims and butted spokes for strength.
